about_the_game:
The world's first DLC dedicated to allowing the player the option to see loose stray male pubic hair on the protagonist's body!

This is an optional, cosmetic DLC. You do not need this DLC for the full Karryn's Prison experience, pick this DLC up only if any of the following appeals to you:
  • You want to see pubic hair on Karryn after having dirty sex with the inmates
  • You think Karryn would look better with blond or black hair
  • You think Karryn's pubes are too trimmed/too bushy

You will also have the ability in the ingame Settings menu to choose any or all of the above options. So if you don't particularly care for seeing male pubes on Karryn but want to see her in black hair, you can turn off Male Stray Pubes ingame and only change her hair color to black!

In addition the CGs related to all the hair and pubes changes, this DLC also comes with 3 new Passives related to male stray pubes!

Note
Cut-ins will retain Karryn's canonical purple hair color.
detailed_description:
The world's first DLC dedicated to allowing the player the option to see loose stray male pubic hair on the protagonist's body!

This is an optional, cosmetic DLC. You do not need this DLC for the full Karryn's Prison experience, pick this DLC up only if any of the following appeals to you:
  • You want to see pubic hair on Karryn after having dirty sex with the inmates
  • You think Karryn would look better with blond or black hair
  • You think Karryn's pubes are too trimmed/too bushy

You will also have the ability in the ingame Settings menu to choose any or all of the above options. So if you don't particularly care for seeing male pubes on Karryn but want to see her in black hair, you can turn off Male Stray Pubes ingame and only change her hair color to black!

In addition the CGs related to all the hair and pubes changes, this DLC also comes with 3 new Passives related to male stray pubes!

Note
Cut-ins will retain Karryn's canonical purple hair color.
name: Karryn's Prison - Stray Pubes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1440x810 Minimum screen resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Installing the game on a SDD is highly recommended. Closing other programs especially browsers while running the game is recommended.

short_description: Are you sick and tired of Karryn's beautiful face untarnished by the presence of stray male pubic hair? THIS IS THE DLC FOR YOU! Also, you can change Karryn's hair color to blond or black, and change Karryn's pubic style as an added bonus!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Russian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
